properties.Name: WriteOffMethod
properties.Description:
There are three methods that are used to recognize customer obligations that are uncollectible:

1. - Direct Write-off Method
2 -  Net Sales Method
3 -  Aging of Accounts Receivable Method

Columns.Name: WriteOffMethodId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a write-off method.

Columns.Name: WriteOffMethodName
Columns.Description: The name of a write-off method.

Columns.Name: WriteOffMethodDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a write-off method.
